client_description_Summary_Note:
The RM first encountered Louise Louna Janssens on a skiing trip in the Swiss Alps. They spent the weekend skiing and discussing various investment strategies, which laid the foundation for a strong professional relationship.
Louise Louna Janssens is a 24 year old and comes from Belgium.
After extensive research, she chose Julius Baer for its strong track record in managing high-net-worth clients.
client_description_Family_Background: Louise Louna Janssens is currently single. She does not have any children.
client_description_Education_Background:
Louise obtained her secondary school diploma from Institut Saint-Stanislas in 2019.
Louise pursued higher education at KU Leuven, graduating in 2025.
client_description_Occupation_History:
Louise Louna Janssens is a 24 year old and comes from Belgium.
Louise Louna Janssens did not start her professional career yet.
client_description_Wealth_Summary:
She did not have any savings to invest in financial markets.
Client does not have any properties.She inherited 1860000 EUR from her grandmother, a well-known Corporate Lawyer, in 2015, allowing her to expand her investment portfolio.
client_description_Client_Summary: The RM is excited to help Louise navigate the challenges of starting a career and building a strong financial foundation.
